Articles.Content:
This is a place for players in the K3 Collab Project to post their missions as part of the projects.

I'd like to remind people to take lots of screenshots. Images are worth a thousand words so it's less writing you need to do.

If you have completed your mission, please post a nice mission report here about it. There are no guidelines so long as you just tell us that you got 'er did and show off. Be creative!

< space reserved in case I need it >

I'm reserving this post for a proper writeup later, but for now, here's a nice long imgur album of my mission to dock the habitation module.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Alright, I'm finished docking the first fuel tank.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Inquiry base progress

Inquiry base is a semi-mobile base ready to be launched and landed in segments on a large Munar Kethane deposit.

Updates:

6 segments so far:

1. Immobile lander

2. Mobile lander-to-standard-height hab. module

3. Mobile four-way hab. module

4. Mobile Kethane drill and small Kethane storage module

5. Mobile off-planet shipment module (Kethane transports)redesigned.

6. Mobile Kethane and standard fuel storage module

7. Mobile Kethane and standard fuel storage module (same as 6)

Note that the 7th module isn't in the train because it was refusing to dock. so I blew it up :I

The base so far can be arranged into a train and driven to other places if needed
